summary: The spacecraft XP327 has crash landed on Nirn! Seek out the wreckage and investigate the crashsite!
descriptionHtml:
Edhildils XP327 Spacesuit
Author: Edhildil
11,26,2014
ver1




[img]http://img832.imageshack.us/img832/1236/descriptionn.png[/img]
 

[color=#f6b26b][size=5]This is a complete joke mod and by far not in any way lore friendly! Yay! [/size][/color]


The spacecraft XP327 has crash landed on Nirn! Seek out the wreckage and investigate the crashsite!


Adds a cool crashsite scene with a respawnable chest of goodies!
I did not weight the armor to BBP or TBBP on purpose because the animations made the breasts look like cones and was horrible!

Made from a custom body shape, no skin is showing so it is compatible with whatever skinset you use (no skin!). Except the face, of course. 

Pieces include:

Spacesuit with environment bubble and breathing tanks
Boots (high)
Gloves (long)
Space cap with goggles and comunication microphone

Location:

See Screenshots. Basically west of the Western Tower past a fort on mountain side. Look for the smoke rising when you get close. There is a chest with the goods in it.

[youtube]e9CuMhbpTzk[/youtube]


[img]http://img84.imageshack.us/img84/3664/updatesb.png[/img]

Perhaps a Space rifle in the future or look for Dwemer Rifle mod here on the Nexus which looks pretty cool.

[img]http://img651.imageshack.us/img651/4153/requir.png[/img]


HDT High Heels system
you also need SKSE, SkyUI for the heels mod
 
[img]http://img827.imageshack.us/img827/2482/installa.png[/img]


Unzip Data file to a temporary location
Check folder paths and make adjustments if needed
copy/paste into Skyrim folder.



Uninstallation:

Delete Data_meshes_armor_edhildil_spacesuit folder
Delete Data_textures_armor_edhildil_spacesuit folder
Delete Edhildils XP327 Spacesuit esp. file

[img]http://img90.imageshack.us/img90/8579/creditslo.png[/img]


Edhildil the new meshes and textures
BB Drac for the awesome Spearhead Catsuit which I used as a base model for the suit. (Catsuit, boots, and gloves)


Tools used:
=======
Blender
Nifscope
GIMP 2


Thanks to all above and to Skyrim Nexus.

[img]http://img4.imageshack.us/img4/4562/usaget.png[/img]

If you want to use my meshes in your mod please give the proper credits listed in your mod readme/description. It would also be nice if you sent me a link so I can check out your mod.
author: Edhildil
